ngiemboon: À něŋ shúm tsɛ̀ɛ pìʼi ńcʉŋe nzèm kwáŋ we.
en: He put the things in the cart and tied it behind his bike.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gɔɔn ngie pɔ́ lâ pɔ̌ e tó.
en: I said they are coming with them.

ngiemboon: Ndyé ne ńkẅɛɛ na káb lê pɔ́g páʼ fʉ̀ʼ gie kẅɛɛ tsɛ̀ɛ tàŋ matûa la.
en: The smoke comes out of the pipe as if it were coming out of the car exhaust.
Here are the pigs. Go stop yours and mine.

ngiemboon: À kabá pɔ̀gɔ pîɛ, à ge gÿo jÿó, à lẅe.
en: He picked an immature avocado, it will be bitter when he eats it.
Come, you and I will join him.

ngiemboon: N jǔʼ ngie ɔ̀ táŋa menɔ̀ɔn
en: I learned that you sell animals

ngiemboon: N jǔʼ ngie ɔ̀ táŋa menɔ̀ɔn

en: I learned that you sell animals
Give these people something to eat.
